name: Freecell Solitaire by Playfrog
description:
The much-loved game Freecell now can be played on your iPad !


FreeCell was firstly created by Microsoft for release with the Windows operating system. It is a solitaire-based card game played with a 52-card standard deck. You can play this classic solitaire game on your iPad now instead of computer. We present you the Freecell with the original rule and nearly all deals can be solved.

In our Freecell, you are allowed to undo any steps and get the hints anytime. Tap Move on/off/auto and Lock Orientation is supported. For the detailed rules, please click the HELP button in game.


This classic game maybe remind you of the days gone. Instead of computer, experience it on your iPad now!


****************************************************************
More games:

Klondike
Spider
Solitaire

****************************************************************

Please feel free to give us any of your feedback. Thanks for your support!
